data.title: SONG: Second Order Non-Gaussianity
data.name: song
data.description: SONG (Second Order Non-Gaussianity) is a Boltzmann code that computes many observables related to the Cosmic Microwave Background and to the cosmological perturbations at second order in perturbation theory.

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "First, download SONG. You can do so either from the project's page <https://github.com/coccoinomane/song/releases> or from the command line with:"
"SONG computes the non-linear evolution of the Universe in order to predict cosmological observables such as the bispectrum of the Cosmic Microwave Background (CMB)."
"To compile and make a test run of SONG, enter SONG's directory and execute the following commands from your terminal: make song ./song ini/intrinsic.ini pre/quick_song_run.pre"
